name: mm::frame::allocator::EarlyFrameAllocator::alloc

core::alloc::Layout::size.doc: The minimum size in bytes for a memory block of this layout.

core::alloc::Layout::align.doc:
The minimum byte alignment for a memory block of this layout.

 The returned alignment is guaranteed to be a power of two.

core::num::<impl usize>::checked_add.doc:
Checked integer addition. Computes `self + rhs`, returning `None`
 if overflow occurred.

 # Examples

 ```
 ```

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 4322, kind: RigidTy(Tuple([Ty { id: 3512, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) }, Mut)) }, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) }])) }), Field(0, Ty { id: 3512, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) }, Mut)) })])

Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 4322, kind: RigidTy(Tuple([Ty { id: 3512, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) }, Mut)) }, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) }])) }), Field(1, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])
Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])

doc: Allocates a contiguous range of frames.
